author: 作者：傅江萍 胡兵
title: 渝水区对非法捕鸟行为说"不"-中国江西网
text:
大江网/大江新闻客户端新余讯 (江西日报通讯员傅江萍、胡兵) 为遏制非法猎捕野生动物行为，连日来，新余市渝水区部署开展“清网护鸟”专项整治行动，全力做好野生动物保护工作，有效提升辖内各级群众野生动物保护意识。
该区林业局联合市场监管、公安、农粮局等相关部门组成多个督导组，下沉到各乡镇上门指导，有效形成“各司其职、密切配合、协同作战”工作格局；开展联合执法，深入城区街道五金店、餐饮店、批发市场等经营场所展开地毯式密集检查，收缴捕鸟网、捕兽夹，切断非法交易链条，有力整顿非法市场。督促各乡镇加强河岸两侧、树林农田周边、主干道路沿线、乡间果园等鸟类活动区域巡查，依法拆除销毁鸟网、捕兽夹等非法猎捕工具，确保野生动物安全自由。
新闻：0791-86849275 广告：86847125 手机报：86847093

author: Stephen Underwood
title: CT Cannabis workers celebrate state’s first-ever union contract
text:
Connecticut cannabis workers are celebrating after voting to ratify the state’s first-ever cannabis union contract, as workers hail the agreement as proof of the industry’s sustainability.
Workers at
Advanced Grow Labs in West Haven voted unanimously to ratify their union contract for a three-year agreement that includes guaranteed wage increases of up to 25% over three years, increased holiday pay, secured retirement and health insurance, increased safety measures, and on the job protection, according to a press release from the company.
“It feels good to be represented and to have a contract that will secure our jobs,” said AGL Laboratory Technician Amber Sampiere. “This is a new and developing industry and we are at the forefront of creating a better future for cannabis workers.”
Back in March, workers came together to form their union with the United Food and Commercial Workers Union Local 919, becoming the first in the state to unionize.
“The workers at Advanced Grow Labs made history by negotiating and ratifying the very first cannabis contract in Connecticut,” said Director of Organizing Emily Sabo. “We know their hard work will inspire more workers to form their unions and pave the way for a better Connecticut cannabis industry.”
UFCW Local 919 represents thousands of cannabis workers across the country in dispensaries, labs, delivery, kitchens, manufacturing, processing, and grow facilities, according to their website. The national UFCW is America’s largest cannabis workers union and has been representing cannabis workers in states across the country for almost two decades.
“These workers join the tens of thousands of other cannabis workers across the country to have formed their union with the UFCW and are ratifying union contracts,” Sabo said.
The union started the Cannabis Workers Rising campaign to help other workers unionize in the emerging cannabis industry.
“I am proud to be a part of the first cannabis union in Connecticut,” said AGL Production Technician Alanna Daniels. “This has been a huge milestone for the industry in the state and our company. I hope other workers can come together like we have.”

organizations.name: united food and commercial workers union

author: macamilarincon
title: Venezuela anuncia ejercicio militar y acusa al Reino Unido de "provocación hostil" por buque en las costas de Guyana
text:
(CNN Español) –– El presidente de Venezuela, Nicolás Maduro, anunció este jueves que ordenó una acción conjunta defensiva en respuesta a lo que señaló como una "provocación del Reino Unido" luego de que inicialmente la BBC reportara, citando al Ministerio de Defensa británico, que se enviaría un buque patrullero a las costas de Guyana.
¿Cómo es la riqueza del Esequibo y cómo contribuyó al crecimiento exponencial de Guyana?
"Por eso he ordenado la activación de una acción conjunta de toda la fuerza armada nacional militar bolivariana sobre el caribe oriental de Venezuela, sobre la fachada atlántica, una acción conjunta de carácter defensiva como respuesta a la provocación y a la amenaza del Reino Unido contra la paz y la soberanía de nuestro país", afirmó Maduro durante la ceremonia de salutación de fin de año a la Fuerza Armada Nacional Bolivariana (FANB).
La reacción de Venezuela sigue a un reporte de la BBC del domingo en el que indicaba, citando al Ministerio de Defensa, que el Reino Unido se preparaba para "enviar un buque de guerra a Guyana en una muestra de apoyo diplomático y militar a la antigua colonia británica".
¿Qué sigue ahora en la disputa entre Venezuela y Guyana por el Esequibo? Puntos claves del acuerdo y posibles escenarios
El HMS Trent, un patrullero de la Marina británica, agregó la BBC, visitará Guyana, "aliado regional y socio de la Commonwealth, a finales de este mes como parte de una serie de compromisos en la región durante su despliegue de tareas de patrulla en el Atlántico". El Ministerio de Defensa del Reino Unido confirmó a CNN en Londres esta declaración.
Maduró calificó a la respuesta venezolana como “acción conjunta militar general Domingo Sifonte” en honor al general que Maduro considera héroe de la Guyana Esequiba y a quien, además, se le rendirá homenaje en enero "trayendo sus restos a que descanse definitivamente en el panteón de los héroes de Venezuela".
Venezuela y Guyana acuerdan seguir con diálogo sobre disputa del Esequibo
La Cancillería de Venezuela publicó un comunicado en rechazo a la llegada del buque británico y advirtió a la Comunidad del Caribe (Caricom) y a la Comunidad de Estados Latinoamericanos y Caribeños (Celac) de que las acciones contradicen el entendimiento acordado el 14 de diciembre entre Venezuela y Guyana.
“La presencia de la nave militar es extremadamente grave, ya que viene acompañada de declaraciones por parte de voceros políticos y militares de quien fungió como despojador de la Guyana Esequiba, el cual insiste en inmiscuirse en dicha controversia”, dice el comunicado.
El encuentro que se llevó a cabo el 14 de diciembre entre los mandatarios de Guyana y Venezuela en San Vicente y las Granadinas cerró con el compromiso de mantener la vía diplomática como el único camino para resolver el conflicto, y se estableció el acuerdo de 11 puntos suscrito por las partes y los mediadores de ambos países.
"Venezuela insta a las autoridades guyanesas a tomar medidas inmediatas para el retiro del buque HMS Trent, y abstenerse de seguir involucrando a potencias militares en la controversia territorial", afirma el comunicado.
CNN está intentando comunicarse con el Ministerio de Defensa del Reino Unido por los informes de que personal militar venezolano participará en ejercicios militares en el golfo de Paria en respuesta al despliegue del HMS Trent en Guyana.
Osmary Hernández colaboró con este reporte.
The-CNN-Wire
™ & © 2023 Cable News Network, Inc., a Warner Bros. Discovery Company. All rights reserved.

author: TudoCelular.com
title: Motorola lança novos Moto G35 e G75 no Brasil; veja preços e especificações
text: Esse G75 seria um ótimo celular se tivesse tela amoled Resultados de 1 a 25 de 25 - 10-17-2024, 09:34 PM [#1](showthread.php?424620&p=3114432&viewfull=1#post3114432) - Membro desde - Apr 2013 - Posts - 195,800 [Motorola lança novos Moto G35 e G75 no Brasil; veja preços e especificações](https://www.tudocelular.com/motorola/noticias/n227376/motorola-moto-g35-g75-lancamento-brasil.html)A Motorola acaba de acaba de atualizar a linha Moto G no Brasil com o lançamento dos novos intermediários Moto G35 e Moto G75, que chegam pouco depois do lançamento do Moto G55. Ontem, 05:40 PM[#2](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114434&viewfull=1#post3114434) - Membro desde - Jan 2023 - Posts - 899 Ontem, 05:54 PM[#3](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114438&viewfull=1#post3114438) - Membro desde - Dec 2022 - Posts - 172 4gb de ram hahahahhaha Ontem, 06:10 PM[#4](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114448&viewfull=1#post3114448)1500 reais em um aparelho com 4GB de RAM, tela IPS, uma atualização de software, Motoenrola sabe que o brasileiro é trouxa, essa bomba vale 800 reais Ontem, 06:55 PM[#5](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114459&viewfull=1#post3114459) Ontem, 06:58 PM[#6](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114461&viewfull=1#post3114461) - Membro desde - Jun 2022 - Posts - 5 4Gb de ram??? LIXO de aparelho, sistema android da Motorola pesado, vi nada vantajoso nesse de 4gb de ram. So o espaço interno mesmo q presta no mínimo. Ontem, 07:35 PM[#7](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114470&viewfull=1#post3114470) Ontem, 08:03 PM[#8](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114475&viewfull=1#post3114475)a única coisa não muito bacana é os 4gb RAM. Poderia ser pelo menos 6GB iniciais. O resto está ok (eu acho) Ontem, 08:24 PM[#9](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114481&viewfull=1#post3114481)Ótimos lançamentos da Motorola, a Motorola está caprichando na linha moto G! Gostei dos smartphones Ontem, 08:31 PM[#10](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114483&viewfull=1#post3114483) - Membro desde - Aug 2023 - Posts - 55 Moto G75 bem melhor que o G85, beleza que G85 tem painel oled mas... É só nisso mesmo que ganha do G75, acho até que o G75 é uma escolha melhor até mesmo ao edge 50 fusion, pois por ser um modelo da linha G, certeza que vai desvalorizar mais rápido, fora que finalmente temos um aparelho da linha G indo além de uma versão de sistema Android Ontem, 08:42 PM[#11](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114487&viewfull=1#post3114487)Quando vc acha que a humanidade tá evoluindo, aí aparece a Motorola com esses retrocessos milenar %uD83E%uDD71 Ontem, 08:54 PM[#12](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114494&viewfull=1#post3114494) Ontem, 08:55 PM[#13](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114495&viewfull=1#post3114495) Ontem, 09:03 PM[#14](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114497&viewfull=1#post3114497)Apenas o segundo é descente com snap, 5 Atl, 8gb Ram. já outro já é deixado pra ser esquecido e morto unisoc, 4gb RAM e 0 Atl. Motoirola é só decepção. Ontem, 09:13 PM[#15](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114502&viewfull=1#post3114502) - Membro desde - Dec 2015 - Posts - 119 A coisa mais impressionante é um celular da Motorola receber todo esse suporte de atualizações Android, estou chocado! Sobre o celulares, o G35 deveria ser pelo menos 6GB mas como vai desvalorizar muito ele vai concorrer com os básicos de 700~900. O G75 é melhor que o G85 o único ponto negativo é a tela mas deve se tornar muito competitivo quando estiver entre 1000~1300. Ontem, 09:27 PM[#16](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114504&viewfull=1#post3114504) - Membro desde - Sep 2018 - Posts - 93 Moto G75 tem carregamento sem fio? Pode ser o celular mais acessível com está tecnologia. Ontem, 10:01 PM[#17](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114517&viewfull=1#post3114517) - Membro desde - Jan 2020 - Posts - 983 Motorola está lançando ótimos aparelhos, SD 6 Gen 3, 256gb e 8 de ram, tela de 120hz, 5 anos de atualizações, carregamento de 33w, produto oficial com garantia, ai vem o comprador de Xiaomi com bugs e anúncios no sistema, que só consegue comprar no mercado cinza, pois oficial custa mais que iPhone, falar mal da Motorola Ontem, 10:08 PM[#18](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114519&viewfull=1#post3114519) Ontem, 11:07 PM[#19](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114531&viewfull=1#post3114531)Migos, usuários de Samsung não tem moral nenhuma pra falar mal das telas ips LCD de nenhuma marca, tá?? Só pra deixar claro %uD83E%uDEE2%uD83E%uDEE2 Ontem, 11:17 PM[#20](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114532&viewfull=1#post3114532) - Membro desde - Jan 2023 - Posts - 20 a partir do G55 pra cima deveria ser só amoled Hoje, 12:11 AM[#21](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114539&viewfull=1#post3114539) - Membro desde - Aug 2023 - Posts - 169 Interessante o G75 também ter vindo com ip68 e carregamento sem fio de 15w, quantos as atualizações, se a Motorola realmente manter isso, será excelente, pena que os modelos fusion, pro e ultra vieram com somente três atualizações de Android Hoje, 01:27 AM[#22](/forum/threads/424620-Motorola-lanca-novos-Moto-G35-e-G75-no-Brasil-veja-precos-e-especificacoes/?p=3114546&viewfull=1#post3114546)2 completos lixos! Samsung sempre a frente. author: Anonym
title: Yvelines: in Magny-les-Hameaux, tensions after the distribution of a leaflet on a mosque project - The Limited Times
text:
He didn't think it prudent to turn back to spend the holidays at home. Pierre-Louis Brière, 25, who lives in Magny-les-Hameaux (Yvelines), a town of 10,000 inhabitants, packed his bags with his wife and children on the night of 8 to 9 December. Since then, he has been staying with relatives. At the beginning of December, he received death threats by phone, about ten of them, according to him. The words he reports are unequivocal: "We're going to massacre you one by one", "We have your address", "We meet you every day in the street and for the moment we smile at you but..." »
What's next after this ad
The avalanche originated in a leaflet linked to the mosque project carried out by the Association of Muslims of Magny (A2MH). The document comes from the Magny Citizens' Committee, an "apolitical" collective born in November 2023 and made up of some 350 people, who are mobilizing "on issues of local interest". "In this text, we were simply asking questions about the opacity surrounding this mosque project," explains Pierre-Louis Brière. It is a request for information for all citizens. »
Subscribe to read more
Already a subscriber? Sign in

author: MarketScreener
title: Philippines could provoke China at 'another Chinese island', says Global Times - MarketScreener
text:
BEIJING (Reuters) - The Philippines could "stir up trouble" at yet another "Chinese" island in the South China Sea, China's state-backed Global Times reported, after what it said were Manila's "provocative intrusions" into waters at two other reefs in the region.
The Philippines is expanding military infrastructure on Thitu Island, which Beijing calls Zhongye Dao, to potentially invite warships and warplanes from countries outside of the region such as the United States and Japan, sabotaging peace and stability in the South China Sea, the nationalist tabloid reported, citing Chinese experts.
Zhongye Dao is a part of Nansha Qundao, as the Spratly Islands are known in China, but "illegally occupied" by the Philippines, Global Times reported late on Thursday.
The Philippines national security council and defence ministry did not immediately respond to Reuters requests for comment.
China claims sovereignty over nearly the whole South China Sea, deploying an armada of coast guard vessels to protect what it considers its territory. An international arbitral tribunal has said Beijing's claim has no basis under international law.
The Philippines, Taiwan, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam and Brunei contest the claims.
The Philippines occupies nearly 10 locations in the South China Sea, including Thitu Island. Manila will develop islands in the South China Sea that it considers part of its territory to make them more habitable for troops, Philippine military chief Romeo Brawner said in January.
In the latest clash between China and the Philippines in the South China Sea, Manila and Beijing accused each other on Monday of ramming vessels and performing dangerous maritime manoeuvres.
The Philippines said two of its coast guard vessels "encountered unlawful and aggressive manoeuvres" from Chinese vessels near Sabina Shoal while on their way to supply Filipino personnel stationed in two occupied islands.
Sabina Shoal is part of the Spratly Islands, which are claimed by China, the Philippines, Taiwan and Vietnam.
The United States condemned China's actions. Its ambassador to Manila, MaryKay Carlson, said the U.S. "stands with the Philippines in condemning the China Coast Guard's dangerous manoeuvres".
The encounter came less than two weeks after an air incident between the Chinese and Philippines militaries in Scarborough Shoal, also in the South China Sea.
(Reporting by Ryan Woo; Editing by Raju Gopalakrishnan)
Share © Reuters - 2024
